page.title: 18PUBLIC SERVICES.
page.content: {"TOMNAHURICH"}IS THE GAELIC WORD FOR {"HILL OF THE YEW TREES" }AND A VERY IMPOSING HILL IT IS,COVERING A BASE AREA OF 42 ACRES AND RISING 200METRES, AT THE WESTERN APPROACH TO INVERNESS. ALTHOUGH IT HAS BEEN IN USE AS A CEMETERY ONLY SINCE 1867,YET CREMATED REMAINS HAVE BEEN FOUND BURIED THERE, POSSIBLY IN THE BRONZE AGE. THERE ARE NOW 47000 GRAVES WITH SPACE SET ASIDE FOR MORE, BECAUSE MANY FAMILIES LIKE TO HAVE THEIR "LAIR" PAID FOR AND READY,CLOSE BY THEIR LOVED ONES GONE BEFORE.MANY PEOPLE THINK THAT THERE SHOULD BE A CREMATORIUM IN INVERNES, BUT THE NEAREST ONES MEANTIME ARE IN ABERDEEN AND PERTH. {"CRAIG PHADRIG HOSPITAL" THIS NATIONAL HEALTH HOSPITAL, SET ON A HILL ABOVE INVERNESS, WAS BUILT IN 1969,TO CATER FOR THE NEEDS OF MENTALLY HANDICAPPED.STAFF : 120NURSES
